name: Kemadruma Dosha
desc: Kemadruma Dosha occurs when there are no planets on either side of moon. Rahu/Ketu are omitted as they are not true planets. According to some astrologers this dosha can also occur when moon is not aspected by any benefic planet or is not in conjunction with any of benefic planets in birth chart
remedies:
Worship Lord Shiva, Parvathi & Lakshmi
keeping fast on Mondays especially when the day falls on Purnima/Full Moon
Wear Sri Yantra made of sliver with pearl in it
